mdRecord.dcterms:title: Roster of Company B 21st Virginia Calvary and Pellham’s Battery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Post war documents – roster of Company B 21st Virginia Calvary and Pellham’s Battery, language and duties suggest post war period, possibly compiled for reunions. 2 original pieces, 8 written pages and 8 photocopied pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
